_id.description: Canonical primary key: deterministic SHA256 (first 16 chars) of mbox file contents

file_hash.description: Full SHA256 hash of the mbox file for complete audit trail and integrity verification

file_size_bytes.description: Size of the original mbox file in bytes

file_path.description: Optional file path for local storage backends. When present, this MUST be a valid non-empty path string (do not use empty string). For storage-agnostic backends (e.g., Azure Blob), omit this field entirely. Archive location is determined by archive_id and backend type.

status.description: Processing status for retry and workflow tracking

attemptCount.description: Number of processing attempts for retry tracking

lastAttemptTime.description: Timestamp of the last processing attempt

lastUpdated.description: Timestamp of last status or field update for observability and forward progress tracking

workerId.description: Optional identifier of the worker/service instance processing this document for debugging and observability
